ai-ja439:1.2_0: I have strong foundations and gateways,
ai-ja439:2.2_0: like a passing in the bird, like a fat,
ai-ja439:2.3_0: What is a legal issue arising from yakkhas?
ai-ja439:2.4_0: I’m the one who swept away,
ai-ja439:3.2_0: if he touches without any of the twenty;
ai-ja439:3.3_0: out of compassion for those who have compassion for relatives.
ai-ja439:5.1_0: A sixteen Bāhiya of the Tree,
ai-ja439:6.3_0: yet those who are free of greed
ai-ja439:7.3_0: Those who haven’t reckoned the unconditioned intentions,
ai-ja439:8.1_0: I gathered in excess of riches, million in wealth,
ai-ja439:8.2_0: do not do what is beneficial,
ai-ja439:8.4_0: would be turned around like that wheel.”
ai-ja439:9.1_0: “How long have the yakkha so long
ai-ja439:10.3_0: Māra’s wheel, do not roll forth your head!
ai-ja439:11.1_0: The first group of four is finished.
